pullRequest.title: Update the Traefik Version to 2.x
pullRequest.bodyText:
Here is the details
a.  Renamed the the script setup.sh to setupLoadBalancer.sh  in kubernetes/samples/charts/util directory
b. Modified the README.md files
c. Removed the reference to Traefik version 1.x
d. Add the references to stable Traefik Version 2.x
e. Modified kubernetes/samples/charts/traefik/values.yaml to reflect V2.x cutomizatiom
f.  Modified configuration files (host-routing.yaml,path-routing.yaml,tls.yaml) in kubernetes/samples/charts/traefik/samples directory to support V2.x
Modified the mii-sample tests to support Traefik 2.x.  This is the only Tests that uses Traefik Load Balancer
Run the test on Kind Cluster. All tests passed
https://build.weblogick8s.org:8443/job/weblogic-kubernetes-operator-kind-new/874/
